text: Silvano Basagni (6 August 1938 - 10 May 2017) was an Italian sport shooter. He competed in the mixed trap at the 1972, 1976 and 1980 Olympics and won a bronze medal in 1972. He was born in Firenze, Italy. Basagni died on 10 May 2017 in Firenze, Italy from multiple myeloma at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from multiple myeloma Category:Cancer deaths in Italy Category:Sport shooters Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Italy
title: Silvano Basagni
